testcase.brief: Under chain 1*1/1*2/1*3/2*1/2*2/2*3/3*1/3*2/3*3, check if interface counter work normally
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition:
Test Procedure:
1) Set radio profile to chain 1*1 “radio profile ng phymode 11ng” “radio profile ng transmit-chain 1” “radio profile ng receive-chain 1” 2) Connect client to AP with low traffic 3) Check if wifi0 counter management/data frame increase in concomitancy “show in wifi0 counter” 4) Loop test step 1 to step 3 by chain setting: 1*2/1*3/2*1/2*2/2*3/3*1/3*2/3*3 5) Loop test step1 to step4 on wifi1

step.desc: 1) Set radio profile to chain 1*1 "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" "radio profile ng transmit-chain 1" "radio profile ng receive-chain 1"
step.telnet: -v "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" -v "radio profile ng transmit-chain 1" -v "radio profile ng receive-chain 1" -v "interface wifi0 radio profile ng" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}"

step.desc: Check if rx data frame counter work well
Check if rx management frame counter work well
Check if tx data frame counter work well
Check if tx management frame counter work well
1) Set radio profile to chain 1*2 "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" "radio profile ng transmit-chain 1" "radio profile ng receive-chain 2"
step.telnet: -v "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" -v "radio profile ng transmit-chain 1" -v "radio profile ng receive-chain 2" -v "interface wifi0 radio profile ng" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}"

step.desc: Check if rx data frame counter work well
Check if rx management frame counter work well
Check if tx data frame counter work well
Check if tx management frame counter work well
1) Set radio profile to chain 1*3 "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" "radio profile ng transmit-chain 1" "radio profile ng receive-chain 3"
step.telnet: -v "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" -v "radio profile ng transmit-chain 1" -v "radio profile ng receive-chain 3" -v "interface wifi0 radio profile ng" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}"

step.desc: Check if rx data frame counter work well
Check if rx management frame counter work well
Check if tx data frame counter work well
Check if tx management frame counter work well
1) Set radio profile to chain 2*1 "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" "radio profile ng transmit-chain 2" "radio profile ng receive-chain 1"
step.telnet: -v "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" -v "radio profile ng transmit-chain 2" -v "radio profile ng receive-chain 1" -v "interface wifi0 radio profile ng" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}"

step.desc: Check if rx data frame counter work well
Check if rx management frame counter work well
Check if tx data frame counter work well
Check if tx management frame counter work well
1) Set radio profile to chain 2*2 "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" "radio profile ng transmit-chain 2" "radio profile ng receive-chain 2"
step.telnet: -v "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" -v "radio profile ng transmit-chain 2" -v "radio profile ng receive-chain 2" -v "interface wifi0 radio profile ng" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}"

step.desc: Check if rx data frame counter work well
Check if rx management frame counter work well
Check if tx data frame counter work well
Check if tx management frame counter work well
1) Set radio profile to chain 2*3 "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" "radio profile ng transmit-chain 2" "radio profile ng receive-chain 3"
step.telnet: -v "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" -v "radio profile ng transmit-chain 2" -v "radio profile ng receive-chain 3" -v "interface wifi0 radio profile ng" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}"

step.desc: Check if rx data frame counter work well
Check if rx management frame counter work well
Check if tx data frame counter work well
Check if tx management frame counter work well
1) Set radio profile to chain 3*1 "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" "radio profile ng transmit-chain 3" "radio profile ng receive-chain 1"
step.telnet: -v "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" -v "radio profile ng transmit-chain 3" -v "radio profile ng receive-chain 1" -v "interface wifi0 radio profile ng" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}"

Check if rx management frame counter work well
Check if tx data frame counter work well
Check if tx management frame counter work well

Check if tx data frame counter work well
